Today, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy presented a new mobile application for military personnel called Army+. It will remove a large amount of paperwork and save time for the military. Electronic reports are currently available in the application, but other documents and secure chat for the military will be added later.??The application is now available in ?? Forwarded From Air Force Commander Mykola Oleschuk?? 2 MISSILES AND 4 ATTACK UAVS SHOT DOWN On the night of August 8, 2024, the enemy hit Kharkiv region with 2 Iskander-M ballistic missiles from the Belgorod region. - Russian Federation, by 2 X-59 guided air missiles from the airspace over the Sea of ??Azov and 4 strike UAVs of the "Shahed" type from Yeisk - Russian Federation. As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, the mobile fire groups of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, anti-aircraft missile troops and EW units of the Air Force shot down two Kh-59 guided air missiles and 4 attack UAVs in Odesa, Kherson and Kirovohrad regions. Thank you for your combat work! ?? Happy Armed Forces Day of the Armed Forces of Ukraine!
